message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I am willing to pay $120 for it.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that you're willing to pay $120, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with $120 as my final offer.
Hi Bob, I understand that you're sticking to your original offer of $120. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
Hello Alice, thank you for your willingness to compromise. I appreciate the effort. My final offer remains at $120.
